_source.short_desc: CORE Intelligence lets you use your voice to get insights about your business, from project financials to resource optimization.
_source.long_desc: CORE Intelligence is a free feature within BQE Core, the all-in-one project management and accounting platform for professional services. It?s a voice-activated AI assistant that allows users to discover deep insights about their business. It also suggests ways to improve performance and efficiency.
_source.target_audience:
Architects & Engineers
Consultants
Accountants
Interior Designers
Industrial Designers
Lawyers
Professional Services Providers

related_products.short_desc: Writesonic is an AI-powered writing assistant with a mission to empower everyone in the world to write anything and publish anywhere.
related_products.features:
Writesonic is an AI-powered writing assistant with a mission to empower everyone in the world to write anything and publish anywhere. 

It's like Canva for writing, with tools that simplify the process of creating, editing, and publishing articles, blog posts, ads, landing pages, eCommerce product descriptions, social media posts, and many other forms of content.

related_products.short_desc: Google Cloud's AI provides modern machine learning services, with pre-trained models and a service to generate your own tailored models
related_products.features: Google Cloud's AI provides modern machine learning services, with pre-trained models and a service to generate your own tailored models. Our neural net-based ML service has better training performance and increased accuracy compared to other large scale deep learning systems. Our services are fast, scalable and easy to use. Major Google applications use Cloud machine learning, including Photos (image search), the Google app (voice search), Translate, and Inbox (Smart Reply).

related_products.short_desc: WebHR is everyone's favorite and a global leader in Cloud HR - Helps you manage the most important asset in your company - your People!
related_products.features: WebHR is revolutionizing the way HR works. WebHR is a Social all-in-one Cloud based HR Software for Small & Medium Enterprises that handles everything from Hire to Retire, in the most innovate way. WebHR not only saves money to the companies, but also boosts productivity, saves space and make inter and intra-office communications fast, reliable and more efficient. WebHR assists in managing a companys most important asset - its People.

related_products.short_desc: Web, on-prem and mobile solutions to help businesses with mapping, data management, predictive modeling, geocoding and more.
related_products.features: Integrated collection of GIS software products; ArcGIS offers unique capabilities and flexible licensing for applying location-based analytics to your business practices. Gain greater insights using contextual tools to visualize and analyze your data. Collaborate and share via maps, apps, dashboards and reports.

related_products.short_desc: Sisense delivers rapid, full-scale analytics on large and scattered datasets and allows for easy exploration of complex data.
related_products.features:
Sisense is the only business intelligence software that makes it easy for users to prepare, analyze and visualize complex data. Sisense provides an end-to-end solution for tackling growing data sets from multiple sources, that comes out-of-the-box with the ability to crunch terabytes of data and support thousands of users--all on a single commodity server.

Sisense has already won over the hearts of some of the worlds leading, most data-intensive companies, including eBay, Henry Schein, NASA

related_products.short_desc: AI that helps you create better SEO content, faster.
related_products.features:
Over 200,000 content creators, SEO's and agencies use Frase to research, write, and optimize high-quality SEO content in minutes instead of hours.

Watch the 2-min explainer video here: https://youtu.be/CNGbsLPVMpQ

related_products.short_desc: New Relic is the only unified data platform that empowers engineers to get all telemetry paired with powerful full-stack analysis tools
related_products.features: New Relic One empowers engineers with a data-driven approach to planning, building, deploying and running software. Offering the only unified data platform that empowers engineers to get all telemetry paired with powerful full-stack analysis tools, New Relic helps engineers get past the what to uncover the why. This improves uptime, reliability and efficiency to deliver exceptional customer experiences that fuel growth. Uncover the why with New Relic.

related_products.short_desc: Get Professional Level Blog Articles in Seconds. Market leading Long content AI copywriting tool.
related_products.features:
Texta.ai is an AI copywriting tool that automatically generates and optimizes long form content. 

AI-powered article writer and 30+ content generation tools will help you to produce a copy for your blog, website, social media, and more

- Become more productive

- Articles that will ranked high on Google Search

- Your key to content marketing

- Original and plagiarism free content

- Boost ad conversions

- Speak to your customers in their mother tongue

related_products.short_desc: Trusted by 92 of the fortune 100, Splunk helps you investigate, monitor, analyze, and act on all of your organizations data.
related_products.features: Trusted by 92 of the fortune 100, Splunk is a customizable data analytics platform that empowers you to investigate, monitor, analyze and act. From IT to security to business operations, Splunk is the data-to-everything platform that enables you to take action in real-time. With Splunk, you can predict and prevent IT problems, streamline your entire security stack, minimize unplanned downtime, and explore and visualize business processes for increased transparency all in one platform.

related_products.short_desc: Built for companies of all sizes, Oorwin provides AI Powered Talent Intelligence to your sourcing, hiring, onboarding, and development.
related_products.features:
Built for companies of all sizes, Oorwin provides AI Powered Talent Intelligence to your sourcing, hiring, onboarding, and development.

Boost productivity through AI-driven candidate ranking and evaluate your prospects in a fraction of the time.

Enjoy rich dashboards, reporting, and AI-enabled analytics that raise the bar. Oorwin seamlessly integrates with your favorite application software to provide a more powerful single platform for your talent ecosystem.

related_products.short_desc: Algolia is the leading search & discovery API for websites and mobile apps. Easy to implement and dev-focused.
related_products.features:
Algolia is an API platform for dynamic experiences that helps businesses maximize the speed of search and discovery, while solving the pain of relevance tuning through AI.

Algolia Search is a powerful, fully hosted API that delivers content to users in milliseconds. Devs can customize the relevance of their UX and get insights on how users interact with it.

Algolia Recommend is a robust API that allows you to build unique product recommendations into any digital e-commerce experience.

similar_products.short_desc: Helpdesk AI to help resolve common cases instantly, predict and prioritize tickets, and assist support agents with relevant knowledge.
similar_products.features:
Transform customer service with human-centered AI.
Resolve common cases instantly, predict and prioritize tickets, and assist support agents with relevant knowledge-all from one AI-powered platform. 

Forethought's platform takes customer service teams beyond traditional chatbots and point-solutions. Built on real NLP and NLU, Forethoughts AI learns continuously to ensure the best customer experience possible.

similar_products.short_desc: New Relic is the only unified data platform that empowers engineers to get all telemetry paired with powerful full-stack analysis tools
similar_products.features: New Relic One empowers engineers with a data-driven approach to planning, building, deploying and running software. Offering the only unified data platform that empowers engineers to get all telemetry paired with powerful full-stack analysis tools, New Relic helps engineers get past the what to uncover the why. This improves uptime, reliability and efficiency to deliver exceptional customer experiences that fuel growth. Uncover the why with New Relic.

similar_products.short_desc: Luigi's Box is a set of e-commerce tools that increase e-commerce sales by providing visitors with the best experience possible.
similar_products.features: Luigi's Box provides personalized site search and product discovery tools for e-commerce websites. Powered by AI and machine learning, our software understands customer behavior to provide better search results and recommend relevant products, boosting e-shop conversion rates and average order value.

similar_products.short_desc: Acrolinx is an AI-powered software built to improve the quality and effectiveness of your enterprise content.
similar_products.features:
Acrolinx is an AI-powered software platform that improves the quality and effectiveness of enterprise content. We help some of the world's most valuable brands meet complex content challenges at immense scale - across writers, languages, and cultures. 

Acrolinx delivers a unified and inclusive content experience across all digital touchpoints, all while avoiding editorial bottlenecks, quality issues, budget overruns, and compliance risk. Maximize the value of your content with Acrolinx.

similar_products.short_desc: Personyze AI uses a variety of algorithms to turn customer data into recommendations that create sales and engagement.
similar_products.features: The AI algorithms in Personyze's recommendation engine allow you to harness the power of machine learning to show every site visitor the products and/or content that are most likely to interest them at every touch-point, for guaranteed results. Algorithms range from the incredibly simple, such as view it again, to the most complex machine learning-based "Recommended for You," that takes into account vast amounts of data, finding even the most counterintuitive patterns.

similar_products.short_desc: AnswerRocket uses natural language processing and AI-driven automation to generate in-depth insights and visualizations in seconds.
similar_products.features: AnswerRocket is the AI-powered solution for business analytics. AnswerRocket leverages artificial intelligence and machine learning techniques to automate the hard work of business analysis, empowering teams to generate business intelligence and advanced analytics in seconds. Whether you need to ask questions in plain English, create interactive visualizations and dashboards, uncover actionable insights, or automate entire workflows, AnswerRocket has you covered.

similar_products.short_desc: Sembly SaaS solution that enables managers and teams to records, transcribes and generates smart meeting summaries with meeting minutes
similar_products.features:
Sembly SaaS solution that enables managers and teams to records, transcribes and generates smart meeting summaries with meeting minutes.

Works with Zoom, Google Meet, MS Teams and Webex. Sembly is available in English across Web, iOS & Android mobile apps. 

The smartest AI meeting assistant that helps easily review & share meeting takeaways, meeting records and transcriptions. 

Turns your meetings into searchable text, highlights key discussion moments, creates notes and summaries.

similar_products.short_desc: Enhance the safety and security of your workplace through real-time insights from our AI-powered video analytics engine
similar_products.features:
Wobot Cloud-based VMS
Enhance the safety and security of your workplace through real-time insights from our AI-powered video analytics engine. This one-stop platform provides you with the comfort of viewing all cameras, events, and incidents on a single application while giving you actionable visual insights in real-time.

- Compatible with All Leading Camera Brands
- Use your existing CCTV cameras
- Seamless onboarding of cameras and Live viewing
- AI-powered Checklist

similar_products.short_desc: Trusted by 92 of the fortune 100, Splunk helps you investigate, monitor, analyze, and act on all of your organizations data.
similar_products.features: Trusted by 92 of the fortune 100, Splunk is a customizable data analytics platform that empowers you to investigate, monitor, analyze and act. From IT to security to business operations, Splunk is the data-to-everything platform that enables you to take action in real-time. With Splunk, you can predict and prevent IT problems, streamline your entire security stack, minimize unplanned downtime, and explore and visualize business processes for increased transparency all in one platform.

similar_products.short_desc: ChatBot is an all-in-one platform to create, deploy, and track chatbots across channels.
similar_products.features: Automate key tasks right away by creating multipurpose chatbots with diverse templates and a visual builder. Connect ChatBot with various tools and platforms using one-click integrations, the open API, webhooks, and Zapier. Design smooth conversational experiences to build better relationships with your customers. Send dynamic responses that encourage customers to chat and interact. Mix and match text, images, buttons, and quick replies to show off your brand, products, and services.

similar_products.short_desc: Cresta is the first real-time productivity suite for the contact center.
similar_products.features: Cresta helps you deliver radically better customer experience and better business outcomes with our patented real-time intelligence for the contact center. Cresta's AI-powered platform provides solutions designed to support every level of your customer-facing business: agents, managers, and leaders.

similar_products.short_desc: Are you fed  up with handling your documents? DocuExpert solves your document processing and review problems.
similar_products.features:
Do your teams spend enormous amounts of time going through documents? If yes, you have now come across the right solution - DocuExpert - for enabling your teams to be efficient and effective in their work.

DocuExpert is an advanced document processing and review AI software platform. DocuExpert SaaS software solution provides precise summarization and highlighting of critical information present in large documents thereby reducing the high cost and time involved in handling documents.

similar_products.short_desc: An intelligent automated order processing solution. Manages your emailed purchase orders from inbox through to ERP integration.
similar_products.features:
Instantly turn PDF purchase orders into sales orders in your ERP.

An incredibly fast and scalable solution, Lucy automation handles the PDF orders your customers send via email. 

Around the clock, emails are opened, purchase orders are read, and sales orders are created in your ERP. Ready to pick, pack, and ship in seconds. No errors, no down time, no late orders, no overtime.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Customer Engagement software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Customer Engagement tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Customer Engagement software helps marketers and business managers create and track customer experiences with personalized, engaging content. Customer engagement software often includes digital and mobile engagement tools, live chat, gamification options, personalized web content, and dynamic forms. Related tools can be found in the Customer Relationship Management software, Customer Loyalty software, Customer Satisfaction software, Gamification software, and Blog software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Decision Support software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Decision Support tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Decision Support software facilitates the decision-making process by helping to prioritize objectives, evaluate alternatives and simulate results. Functionality within this type of software includes data visualization, decision trees, decision tables and scorecards. Decision Support software is related to Business Intelligence software, and Business Performance Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Knowledge Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Knowledge Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Knowledge Management software offers ways to optimize the utility of intellectual capital and intangible assets by capturing, preserving and organizing institutional knowledge in a measurable format. Knowledge Management solutions allow successful strategies to be transferred and replicated throughout an organization. Implementation can be inwardly focused on faster learning, new knowledge creation, and innovation or directed outwardly, providing a self-guided service path for customers. Knowledge Management software is related to Business Intelligence software and Document Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Legal Research software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Legal Research tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Legal Research software and services aggregate court judgements, legislation, regulations and case law from a variety of sources as well as provide tools for automating legislation discovery and analysis.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Live Chat software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Live Chat tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Live Chat software helps organizations connect with their customers in real time. Live Chat applications can be used for customer support, lead generation, and customer engagement. This type of software includes widgets that can be integrated into existing websites, as well as more robust stand alone solutions that allow businesses to track customer interactions, response and conversion rates.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Predictive Analytics software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Predictive Analytics tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Predictive Analytics software helps organizations predict future outcomes and uncover potentially profitable action paths by extracting and analyzing aggregated data about their sales, customers, financials, and overall business performance. Predictive Analytics utilizes integrated data mining, machine learning, AI, and data visualization capabilities to create predictive models that can forecast future trends and outcomes.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Robotic Process Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Robotic Process Automation (RPA) helps businesses automate and optimize processes in order to reduce repetitive work and enhance employee productivity.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Sales Force Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Sales Force Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Sales Force Automation software manages an organization's sales force functions which can include: lead management, customer account management, contact management, quote management, forecasting, customer demographics and employee performance management. Sales Force Automation applications improve sales productivity while providing a method of distribution for sales analytics throughout an enterprise. Sales Force Automation software is related to Commission software, Contact Management software, Lead Management software and Quoting software.

_source.platform_tokenized_text: cloud,saas,web-based desktopmac desktopwindows mobileandroid mobileiphone mobileipad

supported_countries.name: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

_source.short_desc: Integrated accounting, reporting, time & expense tracking, and billing software for professional services firms.
_source.long_desc: CORE centralizes professional services firms' accounting and project data on one beautiful cloud platform. By combining accounting, billing, time and expense tracking, and project management tools, CORE makes it easier to run your business more profitably. It organizes information, automates repetitive tasks, and allows you to spend more time providing services to your clients instead of managing internal processes.
_source.target_audience:
Architects & Engineers
Consultants
Accountants
Interior Designers
Industrial Designers
Lawyers
Professional Services Providers

related_products.short_desc: The leading accounting software for small businesses. Instant access to customer, vendor and employee information.
related_products.features: QuickBooks Desktop Enterprise (Save Up to 55%) is our most powerful accounting and business management solution, made for small to mid-sized product-based businesses. Features include inventory management, customizable reports, order fulfillment, job costing, advanced pricing controls, real-time financial dashboards and advanced tools to manage employees and payments. Enterprise enables up to 40 users, and has over 200 3rd party integrations to help deliver meaningful, additional capabilities.

related_products.short_desc: The leading accounting software for small businesses. Instant access to customer, vendor and employee information.
related_products.features: QuickBooks Desktop Enterprise (Save Up to 55%) is our most powerful accounting and business management solution, made for small to mid-sized product-based businesses. Features include inventory management, customizable reports, order fulfillment, job costing, advanced pricing controls, real-time financial dashboards and advanced tools to manage employees and payments. Enterprise enables up to 40 users, and has over 200 3rd party integrations to help deliver meaningful, additional capabilities.

related_products.short_desc: QuickBooks Online is a small business accounting software and app that allows you to manage your business anywhere, anytime.
related_products.features: QuickBooks Online is a small business accounting software and app that allows you to manage your business anywhere, anytime. Used by over 4.5 million customers, QuickBooks provides smart tools for your business, yet is easy to use. You can organize your books, manage expenses, send invoices, track inventory, and even run payroll. With QuickBooks Online, you can get organized, save time, and even get paid fast by adding payment features. Best of all, you can try it for free for 30 days.

related_products.short_desc: An easy invoicing and accounting solution starting at $7.50/mth (first 4 mths). Join 24 million people who've already used FreshBooks.
related_products.features: FreshBooks Accounting ensures your business decisions are based on actual business data and insights. Set aside enough for tax time, learn the costs of running your business, find out if you have money to hire and confidently forecast your earnings. Try it free for 30 days, no credit card required.

related_products.short_desc: All-in-one software for tax preparers, accountants, and bookkeepers. Run your practice from a single integrated hub.
related_products.features:
TaxDome is an all-in-one practice management platform for CPAs, EAs, bookkeepers, and accounting firms. 

TaxDome allows firms of all sizes to streamline their practice by using one platform for both internal practice management (workflow, CRM, reporting) and client-facing tools (documents, signatures, invoicing, messages). Every client, every email, every job, every invoice: all in one shared place for your team.

Automated workflows, signatures, client onboarding, and client communication are

related_products.short_desc: Beautiful cloud-hosted online accounting software for small businesses. Accessible anytime, anywhere.
related_products.features: Award-winning online accounting software designed for small business owners and accountants. Available on any computer or mobile device with an internet connection. Business finances and cashflow are updated in real time. Imports transactions from bank accounts. Unlimited user logins. Integrates with over 1,000 3rd-party business applications. Supports multiple currencies. Data is accessible through a single ledger, allowing accountants and clients to collaborate around finances.

related_products.short_desc: Accounting tool that provides multi-monitor support and past due stamps through improved cash flow.
related_products.features: Accounting tool that provides multi-monitor support and past due stamps through improved cash flow.

related_products.short_desc: NetSuite accounting software simplifies the process of recording transactions, managing AP and AR, and closing the books.
related_products.features: NetSuite cloud accounting software provides the tools needed to effectively manage accounting data and accelerate the close process. Automated tasks reduce data inefficiency and risks of error while customizable reports, dashboards, and real-time metrics help companies monitor business and improve financial control. NetSuite supports multiple currencies, languages, and compliance standards and ensures data is accessible securely worldwide.

related_products.short_desc: QuickBooks is an end-to-end accounting software that can grow with your business.
related_products.features: QuickBooks Online Advanced is a cloud-based, all-in-one, accounting and business hub solution, designed for growing, small to mid-sized businesses. Get performance reporting with highly customizable tracking tools, automated workflows, and real-time revenue and cash flow management dashboards. Seamlessly integrate best-in-class Premium Apps like Salesforce and HubSpot (CRM), Bill.com (accounts payable), DocuSign, LeanLaw & more to expand your capabilities as your business needs grow.

related_products.short_desc: BigTime is the engine empowering the greatest accounting firms on the planet to budget, track & bill their most important asset: time.
related_products.features: Accounting firms need more than just a timesheet. They need a system that unifies budgeting, project planning/execution, team communication, task management, resource management, invoicing and project financials. BigTime gives you the tools your team needs to deliver billable work on time and on budget, giving our customers an average improvement of 25% in gross margins and a substantial increase in expansion and referral revenue. "We didn't have to compromise or change the way we operated."

similar_products.short_desc: The #1 Accounting Software and Financial Management Solution. Built for Finance by Finance
similar_products.features: Choose the flexible and scalable financial platform that delivers deep accounting capabilities, including payroll, tax filings, and inventory tracking tools, across multiple industries designed with a single aim-to accelerate your success. Small to medium-sized businesses prefer Sage Intacct for its ease of use, integrated multi-dimensional reporting, high customer satisfaction, dedicated support, and more. Maximize impact and future-proof your business with a partner who can scale with you.

similar_products.short_desc: NetSuite accounting software simplifies the process of recording transactions, managing AP and AR, and closing the books.
similar_products.features: NetSuite cloud accounting software provides the tools needed to effectively manage accounting data and accelerate the close process. Automated tasks reduce data inefficiency and risks of error while customizable reports, dashboards, and real-time metrics help companies monitor business and improve financial control. NetSuite supports multiple currencies, languages, and compliance standards and ensures data is accessible securely worldwide.

similar_products.short_desc: Corpay's accounting software enables AP teams to pay all invoices, regardless of payment type, in a single automated workflow.
similar_products.features: Corpay is an accounting software for large enterprises that streamlines all invoice payments into a single digital workflow, across multiple locations, bank accounts, payment methods, & approval hierarchies. When it's time for a payment run, submit and approve payments in our software, then Corpay pays vendors according to their remit-to instructions and in their preferred method. Choose the AP solution that's purpose-built to generate efficiency & savings for large, complex organizations.

similar_products.short_desc: Visual Lease is the #1 lease optimization software provider and has helped over 1,000 organizations achieve and maintain compliance.
similar_products.features: Visual Lease is the #1 lease optimization software provider. We help organizations become compliant with FASB, IFRS and GASB lease accounting standards, while simultaneously improving the financial, legal and operational performance of their leases. Visual Lease provides efficient lease accounting tools, robust lease management technology, and comprehensive integrations to help companies save time, save money and stay compliant with lease accounting standards.

similar_products.short_desc: Accounting practice management software built to empower accounting firms to spend more time helping their clients succeed.
similar_products.features: Unclunk your accounting firm with Canopy's cloud-based practice management suite. It's client, document, workflow, time, billing, email, tax, and staff management. But that's a mouthful. Doing all of these things in one software eliminates switching and clicking, which will help you and your staff improve efficiency, organization, and accuracy. You'll even be able to help keep your clients efficient and organized with the client portal, automated reminders, eSign, payments, and more. Try Canopy!

similar_products.short_desc: Acumatica Cloud ERP offers powerful finance and business intelligence tools to streamline company-wide accounting processes.
similar_products.features: Acumatica Cloud ERP offers powerful finance and business intelligence tools to streamline company-wide accounting processes. Track costs, control billing, and manage time/expenses with multi-currency support and powerful financial reports. Acumatica makes real-time financial data available anytime, anywhere, on any device. Harness this data to make informed accounting decisions, reduce workloads, close the books faster, accelerate growth, and transform how you do business in the digital economy.

similar_products.short_desc: Bill.com is the intelligent business payments platform that delivers financial process efficiency, time savings, and full control.
similar_products.features: Bill.com delivers financial process efficiency through streamlined accounts payable (AP) and accounts receivable (AR) management. Reduce errors and increase efficiency by leveraging artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning. Bill.com gets more intelligent as you use it, learning your processes and preferences to give you greater control over every aspect of bill management.

similar_products.short_desc: Simple, easy-to-use accounting software to help you manage your business finance in a smart way!
similar_products.features: Zoho Books is an online accounting software that allows you to easily manage the money flowing in and out of your business. Manage your customers and invoices, while keeping expenses in check. Record, monitor and reconcile your bank accounts and transactions, and collaborate with your accountant in real-time. Most importantly, Zoho Books helps you make better, more informed decisions and stay on top of your business.

similar_products.short_desc: BigTime is the engine empowering the greatest accounting firms on the planet to budget, track & bill their most important asset: time.
similar_products.features: Accounting firms need more than just a timesheet. They need a system that unifies budgeting, project planning/execution, team communication, task management, resource management, invoicing and project financials. BigTime gives you the tools your team needs to deliver billable work on time and on budget, giving our customers an average improvement of 25% in gross margins and a substantial increase in expansion and referral revenue. "We didn't have to compromise or change the way we operated."

similar_products.short_desc: Centime Cash Flow Control integrates with your General Ledger and bank accounts to help you control and manage cash flow.
similar_products.features:
Centime helps accounting departments, SMBs, CPAs, bookkeepers and fractional CFOs forecast cash flow, collect faster, pay smarter and access credit.

Centime Cash Flow Control is a cloud-based solution that integrates with businesses' General Ledgers and bank accounts, and helps them control their cash with real-time forecasting, tools to speed collections and manage AP and easily access short-term credit.

Supported General Ledgers: 
QuickBooks Online
QuickBooks Desktop
NetSuite

similar_products.short_desc: Discover SAP S/4HANA Cloud, a complete ERP system with embedded AI and machine learning.
similar_products.features: SAP S/4HANA Cloud is a complete enterprise resource planning (ERP) system with built-in intelligent technologies, including AI, machine learning, and advanced analytics. It helps companies adopt new business models, manage business change at speed, orchestrate internal and external resources, and use the predictive power of AI. Benefit from tight, native integration between processes, industry depth, and a consistent in-memory data model.

similar_products.short_desc: DAVO sets aside sales tax daily and pays and files it, on time and in full - guaranteed. Try it for free for the first 30 days!
similar_products.features:
DAVO by Avalara uses sales data from your POS system to set aside the exact amount of sales tax you collect every single day and then files and pays it when it's due. It's fully automatic. Absolutely secure. Totally guaranteed.

If you are a brick and mortar business and you sell things, chances are you have to collect and pay sales tax. DAVO can do it for you.

DAVO is available on Clover, Square, Toast, Lightspeed, Vend, SpotOn, Quickbooks Online, Heartland, Par Brink, Upserve, Poynt & Revel.

similar_products.short_desc: Reinvent the way your business does accounting! Accounting Seed is a cloud-based accounting platform backed by the power of Salesforce.
similar_products.features: Accounting Seed is a full accrual accounting platform powered by Salesforce suited for any sized business across any industry. Our software tracks financial data through the entire business lifecycle from lead to ledger. Easily customize and configure Accounting Seed to meet your business needs with clicks, not code. As a top-rated solution by G2, CFO Tech Outlook, and the Salesforce AppExchange, our customization and automation enable users to run their accounting their way.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Accounting Practice Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Accounting Practice Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Accounting Practice Management software helps professional accountants manage workflow, communicate with their clients, and automate their daily processes.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Accounts Payable software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Accounts Payable tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Accounts Payable software automates the process of controlling cash expenditures. These applications help improve cash management and reduce effort by tracking invoices, providing tools for capturing errors, and generating reports. Accounts Payable solutions are designed to work with General Ledger and Accounting applications. Accounts Payable software is related to Accounting software and Billing and Invoicing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Accounts Receivable software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Accounts Receivable tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Accounts Receivable software deals with money that is owed to an organization. It automates the recording of payments on outstanding invoices and provides reports on collection and aging. Along with reports, Accounts Receivable applications generate monthly customer statements and collection letters. Accounts Receivable solutions integrate with Accounting software. Accounts Receivable software is related to Accounting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Audit software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Audit tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Audit software automates the process of preparing and executing audits by helping organizations analyze data, assess risks, track issues, report results, and manage paperwork. Audit software is related to Compliance software, Financial Reporting software and Financial Risk Management software.

Budgeting solutions allow for timely and accurate data management and analysis in order to give an overall picture of a business' growth and profitability. Multiple users across various departments can contribute their projected expenses and revenues to the organization's budgeting system, providing an automated budget approval process. Budgeting software is related to Accounting software, Business Performance Management software and Financial Reporting software.

related_categories.description: Compliance software enables an organization to monitor internal controls to ensure that standards and regulations are met. Compliance solutions that focus on financial and accounting compliance standards, such as the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, help organizations streamline financial documentation, audit trails, and reporting. Compliance solutions that focus on environmental compliance standards help organizations monitor and report on emissions, hazmat procedures, and regulatory policies. Compliance software is related to Accounting software, and EHS Management software.
